page.title: 14MY WEEKEND
page.content: At the weekend we all tend to do different things.The times we get up vary between 6.am and 11am.The things we do when we wake up are to read, watch T.V. or play with our toys.Then we go to get a paper or some sweets or a comic.We might take our dog for a walk or do our homework.We have our lunch at 1.pm and it is usually a snack.On Saturday afternoon we sometimes go to town or play with our friends.Saturday night the girls watch Dynasty and the boys watch Hunter or T.J.Hooker.Usually we go to bed at 10.pm.Some weekends we go on camps with the cubs.We take:-a sleeping bag, a knife,fork and a spoon,a rucksack, a cup and some trunks.We go on walks up mountains and play games. We have to learn about different things in order to get our badges.
